title: Instagram AI Agent Configuration
description: Configure your AI-powered Instagram automation agent for optimal engagement and content strategy

openaiApiKey.title: OpenAI API Key (Optional)
openaiApiKey.description: Your OpenAI API key for AI content generation (leave empty for basic automation)

targetHashtags.title: Target Hashtags
targetHashtags.description: Hashtags to monitor and engage with (without #)

targetAudience.title: Target Audience
targetAudience.description: Describe your target audience for better AI decisions
targetAudience.default: Small business owners interested in digital marketing

engagementRate.title: Engagement Rate (%)
engagementRate.description: Percentage of discovered posts to engage with

commentRate.title: Comment Rate (%)
commentRate.description: Percentage of liked posts to also comment on

followRate.title: Follow Rate (%)
followRate.description: Percentage of engaged posts to follow the user

enableScheduledPosting.title: Enable Scheduled Posting
enableScheduledPosting.description: Enable automated posting at scheduled times

postingFrequency.title: Posting Frequency
postingFrequency.description: How often to post content automatically

maxLikesPerHour.title: Max Likes per Hour
maxLikesPerHour.description: Maximum likes per hour to avoid Instagram restrictions

maxCommentsPerHour.title: Max Comments per Hour
maxCommentsPerHour.description: Maximum comments per hour to avoid Instagram restrictions

maxFollowsPerHour.title: Max Follows per Hour
maxFollowsPerHour.description: Maximum follows per hour to avoid Instagram restrictions

delayBetweenActions.title: Delay Between Actions (seconds)
delayBetweenActions.description: Delay between actions to appear more human-like

useProxies.title: Use Apify Proxies
useProxies.description: Use residential proxies for better security
